@ henrikhoe ac3 is the most advanced and most updated codec that we have in our hand right now...i am amazed that you have said it messed up...if your using windows PC than you sure would face problem with AAC Dolby Pro Logic II because of the audio did not sync with video-if that's case use MKVToolnix http://www.bunkus.org/videotools/mkvtoolnix/downloads.html

files play fine on windows 7 out of the box install with no additional codecs or software.  I however highly recommend you use VLC.  You could even use Quicktime or iTunes.  There isn't any fault with the file format or audio streams.  Any fault is due to your computers configuration.
